name: Salmon teriyaki lunch box
description: Salmon with homemade Teriyaki sauce, green salad, stir-fried clear noodles, fried rice and dumpling.

name: Tofu dolsot
description: Rice topped with tofu, mushrooms, bean sprouts, radishes, carrots, watercress and a fried egg in a sizzling stone bowl, usually mixed with red pepper paste, served with seaweed soup.

name: Woo tang
description: Korean cabbage soup with bean sprouts and green onions, served with rice, slightly spicy.

name: Spicy pork
description: This slices of pork tenderloin marinated with homemade spicy sauce, served with rice.

name: Dolsot Bibimbap
description: Rice topped with beef, mushrooms, bean sprouts, radishes, carrots, watercress and a fried egg in a sizzling stone bowl, served with seaweed soup, usually mixed with red pepper paste.
